events.title: Lift 1 Taking a Quick Break
events.impact: Lift is inaccessible during this time
events.reason: Routine maintenance to keep the lift in tip-top shape for your comfort and safety
events.alternative_access: Lift 2 is accessible. The stairs are also open too, but feel free to chat the neighbors
events.updates: We'll keep you posted on any changes via the building app

events.title: Lift 2 Nap Time
events.impact: Lift is inaccessible during this time
events.reason: Routine maintenance to the lift for smooth cruises
events.alternative_access: Time to lace up those sneakers and work-out those glutes!
events.updates: All whispers on the progress will be on the building app

events.title: Roof Getting a Refresh
events.reason: Repairs to keep your cozy haven leak-free and weatherproof for years to come.
events.expected_duration: 1 day, if the weather doesn't ruin the party
events.alternative_access: The building operations remain uninterrupted, but it is also a good day to shop for groceries and visit old friends
events.updates: Any changes will be on the building app

events.title: Fire Alarm & Smoke Detector Snooze Fest
events.location: Entire Building - Mainly Hallways and Common Areas
events.reason: Routine maintenance to keep the fire alarm system sharp and alert
events.alternative_access: All entrances and exits remain open
events.updates: Stay updated via the building app

events.title: Lobby Gone MIA
events.alternative_access: No need to miss out! Take a lazy walk around or relax by the coutyard
events.updates: Updates will be posted via the building app
